short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A NBC News Data / Graphics tool that helps locate embed URLs for graphics in stories on NBCNews.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables speedy access when people work with iframed graphic embeds. This extension simplifies access to public graphic URLs that have been published on NBCNews.com and lets users of all skill levels find the graphic URL for embedding in other articles.
